fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.batteries.mil

Class RunBatteriesUnitaryMILSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.batteries.mil.RunBatteriesUnitaryMILSimulation

  • public class RunBatteriesUnitaryMILSimulation
extends java.lang.Object
    The class RunBatteriesUnitaryMILSimulation is the main class used to run simulations on the models of the batteries in isolation.

    Description

    The simulation architecture for the solar panel contains two atomic models composed under a coupled model:

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-09-29

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
